subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The British sprinter Dwain Chambers said he took more than 300 drugs in a year in which he passed 10 doping tests. Chambers was the first high-profile athlete tied to the Balco scandal when he tested positive in 2003 for the previously undetectable steroid THG.
